description:
Computes a dissimilarity metric between two images.

Currently only the mean squared difference is fully implemented.

References:

space.title: space
space.description: voxel (default): per voxel image1: scanner space of image 1 image2: scanner space of image 2 average: scanner space of the average affine transformation of image 1 and 2

interp.title: interp
interp.description: set the interpolation method to use when reslicing (choices: nearest, linear, cubic, sinc. Default: linear).

metric.title: metric
metric.description: define the dissimilarity metric used to calculate the cost. Choices: diff (squared differences), cc (non-normalised negative cross correlation aka negative cross covariance). Default: diff). cc is only implemented for -space average and -interp linear and cubic.

nonormalisation.title: nonormalisation
nonormalisation.description: do not normalise the dissimilarity metric to the number of voxels.

overlap.title: overlap
overlap.description: output number of voxels that were used.

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.
